website_summaries.verdict: Skechers unveils another notable member on its golf line-up. The Skechers GO GOLF Mojo Elite boasts of tour-ready features all wrapped up in a stylish package. Though golfers have noticed some setbacks, overall, they are completely satisfied with the benefits that they experienced.
pros: A considerable number of golf players are overjoyed that they can power through the 18 holes without any issues
Plenty of users have compared this spikeless shoe to cleated versions
It has the same amount of turf grip as a steel-spiked pair
Several commenters commend the brand for offering wide sizes for this particular model
A handful of consumers are driven into purchasing this item because of its stylish look
Basing on the features of this shoe, some of the users can attest that this item is value for money
cons: A couple of reviewers experience issues on how hard it is to put the shoe on
A shoehorn is needed to wear it with ease
A professional golfer is a bit disappointed with the lacing system of the Mojo Elite
It doesn’t hold the position tightly despite the four eyelets

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe not right fit.
customer_reviews.text: Due to covid, I am 66 had cancer and been on lockdown. So I thought I would try some new golf shoes via Amazon. Unfortunately medium was too tight a fit for me. That's when i realised they are not free returns. Still awaiting my £107.37 refund having returned the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: nellius

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: This has a 1 star due to the quality of the shoe. First of all the shoe was very comfy and waterproof it also looked really good but biggest downfall was after just 2 wears they split over the top of the toes. Sketchers have asked for them back to see
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Front material has frayed after only two rounds
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are probably the most comfortable I've worn on the course but sadly the front (upper) material has torn in 3 or 4 places after only two rounds. Really disappointing for £100+ a throw.
customer_reviews.author: moores66

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but on the down side the soft material at the front is very difficult to clean. So ok for very dry conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have Skechers Lite-Weight trainers and found them very comfortable and hard wearing. These shoes are just as comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ricfen

customer_reviews.title: Golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoe a bit tight over the top of foot as I have a big instep.Did buy wide fit but did not realise the design of shoe was not open as per normal shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kiltedhugh

customer_reviews.title: That this is a slip on shoe
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the golf shoe does not open up fully at the tongue is fixed as part of the shoe. Unable to get foot in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: linda batey

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were returned after a few wears, the material frayed like it had been snagged on a thorn at the creases
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable golf shoe, lots of support, as you'd expect from Sketchers
customer_reviews.author: d a fairman

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best golf shoes I've ever worn. Superb comfort. Lightvweight Good grip in the wet. Look great as well. Haven't tested waterproof claims but not bothered as I have sketchers winter shoes for that. Thoroughly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wates

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Mojo Waterproof Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: The Skechers Mojo golf shoe features our revolutionary Grip-Flex outsole. This outsole provides excellent traction and flexibility without the hassle of changing Skechers H2GO Shield offers waterproof protection with a 2 year guarantee. STAY COMFORTABLE FOR ALL 18 HOLES - Ultra lightweight, responsive ultra flight damping and a high performance Resamax pad insert.
